pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium D 830 (2 * 3000) or equivalent
  • Graphics: Geforce GT 610 (1024 MB) or equivalent
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: “Love n Dream” is a puzzle game with many kawaii girls. You will be transformed into multiple roles to approach all of our girls. Your job is to unlock their desired, characteristic, favorite, hate by using your skill to solve all the puzzle and understand more about them.
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
